description: Managed Security Services RFP the goal of this mandate is to engage a reputed service provider organization that will be responsible for the management of SIEM services via a Security Operation Centre on a 24x7x365 basis. # Canadian Commercial Corporation (CCC)  
## Invitation to Tender

### Government Tender Announcement
The Canadian Commercial Corporation (CCC) invites tender for the Managed Security Services (MSS) contract, reference number [**cb-8380-84061746**](#td_se_num).
### Tender Details
This request for proposal (RFP) seeks the delivery of Managed Security Services (MSS) for Security Incident Event Management (SIEM) and Security Operations Centre (SOC) for all CCC assets on-premise and cloud-based assets.

## Key Details
*   Tender Number: **cb-8380-84061746**
*   Amendment Number: **3**
*   Solicitation Number: **106205.138**
*   Publication Date: **2023-08-22**
*   Closing Date: **September 20, 2023, 14:00:00 (local time)**
*   Territory: Canada
*   Type of Tender: Competitive (Open Bidding)

## Selection Criteria
Proposal evaluation will be based on the following criteria:

*   Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

## Requirements
CCC requires the selected service provider to deliver MSS for SIEM and SOC services on a 24x7x365 basis.

## Delivery Date
The expected contract start date will be announced at a later time, as will the date of contract completion.

## About the Contract
CCC intends to engage a reputable service provider organization for a one-year term with the option of renewing the contract on a year-by-year basis. 

## Trade Agreements
This bid is open to foreign suppliers participating in the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) or the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Where to Track More Information
Further information and specific requirements to be submitted by the bidder are included in the addenda [available on Canada Buys Platform here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8380).
